text: Micropholis crassipedicellata is a species of tree in the family Sapotaceae. The plant is endemic to the Atlantic Forest ecoregion in southeastern Brazil. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== crassipedicellata Category:Endemic flora of Brazil Category:Flora of Atlantic Forest (biome) Category:Trees of Brazil Category:Conservation dependent plants Category:Near threatened biota of South America Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Micropholis crassipedicellata
